title: Extend frontend Message types
description: Define Attachment and RepliedMessage interfaces in frontend types. Update Message interface to include repliedToMessage and attachments fields. Ensure type compatibility with backend DTOs.
dod: Attachment interface defined with url, type, metadata fields
RepliedMessage interface defined with id, content, senderType, mediaUrl, sentAt fields
Types match backend DTO structure exactly
All existing Message fields remain unchanged
